edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.specs

Class OnlineProtocolP2

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.specs.OnlineProtocolP2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Protocol

    public class OnlineProtocolP2
extends java.lang.Object
implements Protocol
    This class represents the second party in the online phase of Malicious Yao protocol.

    The full protocol specification is described in "Blazing Fast 2PC in the "Offline/Online Setting with Security for Malicious Adversaries" paper by Yehuda Lindell and Ben Riva, page 20 - FIGURE E.3 (The Online Stage).

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)

    • Constructor Detail

      • OnlineProtocolP2

        public OnlineProtocolP2(ExecutionParameters mainExecution,
                ExecutionParameters crExecution,
                CryptoPrimitives primitives,
                CommunicationConfig communication,
                java.util.ArrayList<LimitedBundle> mainBucket,
                java.util.ArrayList<LimitedBundle> crBucket,
                KProbeResistantMatrix mainMatrix,
                KProbeResistantMatrix crMatrix)
        Constructor that sets the parameters.
        Parameters:
        mainExecution - Parameters of the main circuit.
        crExecution - Parameters of the cheating recovery circuit.
        primitives - Contains the low level instances to use.
        communication - Configuration of communication between parties.
        mainBucket - Contain the main circuits (for ex. AES).
        crBucket - Contain the cheating recovery circuits.
        mainMatrix - The probe-resistant matrix used to restore the main circuit's keys.
        crMatrix - The probe-resistant matrix used to restore the cheating recovery circuit's keys.

        Sets the input for the protocol.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        protocolInput - The input for the circuit.

      • run

        public void run()
        Executes the second party of the online protocol.

        basically, it computes the main circuit and than the cheating recovery circuit.

        Specified by:
        run in interface Protocol

        Get the output of the protocol.
